ModuleDescription:
This module aims to equip students with sufficient
knowledge to understand common air pollution problems
due to various anthropogenic activities as well as the
environmental fate of air pollutants in the atmosphere, and
to evaluate potential hazards of air pollutants to the society
and the environment. Students will also develop capability to
analyse of air quality monitoring data for the development
and application of effective air quality control strategies and
government policies in the environment of interest.
